name: Furious Chase
description:
Furious Chase is an Old School Die and Retry One Button Arcade Game. 

Use you strenght to brick walls and get the objective as fast as possible! Make quick decisions and run out before the laser gets you !

NOTE : Furious Chase is a One Button game so, every interaction with the screen is done with Impulsion or holding ur finger on the screen, no matter where.

Credits : 

  • Game Designer, Graphist, Game Programmer : 
    • Yoan Delalonde : Linkedin
  • Musics:
    • Bensound : https://www.bensound.com
